post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
I added a new test case in StudentTest.java. It shows how to get a student by its ID - i.e. using hSesssion.get(...).

You need to refer to the database script to see which columns must not be null - this should be done as part of validation in the JSP pages - to avoid exceptions coming from the database.

Thanks.
post.title: [re] Student model에 대한 궁금...
